item.title: EGAIN Corp 10-K
item.description: EGAIN Corp, which is in the Services-Prepackaged Software [7372] industry, SEC 10-K filing on September 13, 2022 had 25116 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: revenue - 304 instances 30 - 233 instances 2022 - 228 instances may - 220 instances june - 216 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here. View the actual filing on the SEC website here
